opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of February, 2013, the “Motion Seeking Leave to File Out of Time,” which is treated as an Application for Relief, is DENIED. The Prothonotary is instructed to strike the names of the jurists’ from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
